trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around January 8th 2009
Summary: Out front window, I saw a very brightr light, no planet, no star, I watched it for an hour. It blinked in and out.
divs: Sighting DetailsI checked out in the front of my house, to make sure everything is ok.I noticed above the trees a very bright white light. I watched it off and on for one hr. My son said it was a star. No it wasnts. as I watched it I noticed that it would fade in and out. I knew then it wasn't a planet or star. It also would sue a blue light around it it would wobble .I live approx. 12 miles from Atlanta. there were no planes in the area.I have been seeing this off and on since Christmas.
